mapper.select: SELECT r.code FROM member m LEFT JOIN department d ON m.department_id = d.id LEFT JOIN position p ON m.position_id = p.id LEFT JOIN job j ON m.job_id = j.id LEFT JOIN rank rnk ON m.rank_id = rnk.id LEFT JOIN role r ON ( r.id = d.role_id OR r.id = p.role_id OR r.id = j.role_id OR r.id = rnk.role_id ) WHERE m.employee_number = #{employeeNumber}
